deals.title: Grape HYDR8 - Cold Pressed Juice
deals.itemDescription:
Grape, lemon, probiotics, pink himalayan salt.

This cold pressed juice contains 1 billion flora of probiotics.

Grapeshot is one of Pure Green’s sport performance cold pressed juice flavors. The Grapeshot formula was designed with electrolytes in mind which the pink Himalayan sea salt paired with the other ingredients in the formula support. The GanedenBC30 probiotics contain many strains of probiotics to aid in gut-health.

We are a proud supporter of local and organic farms.

deals.title: Melon HYDR8 - Cold Pressed Juice
deals.itemDescription:
Watermelon, strawberry, lime, probiotics and pink himalayan salt.

The Melon Hydr8 cold pressed juice is a delicious tasting sport performance geared cold pressed juice. The cold pressed strawberry and watermelon juice in this uniquely flavored formula provides a savoring flavor profile. This cold pressed juice also contains a touch pink Himalayan sea salt for electrolytes and GanedenBC30 probiotics for various strains of flora to promote gut-health.

We are a proud supporter of local and organic farms.

deals.title: Pure Health Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, banana, almond milk.

Toppings: sliced banana, hemp granola.

The Pure Health Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with a touch of banana for a creamy base and topped with sliced banana and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Blue Banana Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blue spirulina, açai, banana, grass-fed whey protein, cashew butter, coconut butter, & almond milk.

The Blue Banana has a natural vibrant light blue color which comes from the blue spirulina and has a flavor profile with notes of vanilla ice cream but is made with all superfoods.
